comment.author: 29079609@N02
comment._content: 4th of the Kaiser Class of battleships, named for the last king of Saxony en.wikipedia.org/wiki/SMS_K%C3%B6nig_Albert

comment.author: 83025347@N00
comment._content: I was excited there for a minute because I thought this was going to be SS König Albert, a liner commissioned in 1899. It carried my wife's great-great grandfather back from Italy with his new wife in 1908. But that's a different ship.
